## ‚≠êSVG-Generator

A tool used to create a link that contains  __ANY__  SVG file you want!

## ‚ù§Example

`https://svggen.netlify.app/svg?xml=PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDov...`

which refers to this SVG file

![Example image](https://svggen.netlify.app/svg?xml=PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHZlcnNpb249IjEuMSI%%2BICAgCjwvc3ZnPg%3D%3D)

## üîçCompile and Hot-Reload for Development
`sh
netlify dev
`
